document_data.name: cursed Imaskari hat
document_data.mainbody: The '''cursed Imaskari hat'''<ref group="note">Note that this hat is never referred to using this name in the book: it is merely described. was an [[Imaskari]] relic unearthed from the ruins of [[Solon]] by the slaves of [[Ambuchar Devayam]].{{cite book/Blood Charge|54}}
document_data.Description: This hat was conical, made from iron pyrite, also known as fool's gold.
document_data.Powers: Any person who put the hat on would lose a great deal of their intelligence permanently.
